title: ﻿क्या १९९२ में बाबरी मस्जिद गिराई गई तब साध्वी प्रज्ञा सिंह महज 4 साल की थी ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Pragya Singh Thakur, BJP's Bhopal candidate: Yes, I had gone there (Ayodhya), I had said it y'day too, not denying it. I had demolished the structure. I will go there & help in the construction of Ram temple, nobody can stop us from doing that, Ram rashtra hain, rashtra Ram hain. pic.twitter.com/d1g5kBA8Az
